description.summary: An easy and delicious crockpot ziti pasta with ground beef, marinara sauce, and melted cheese. Perfect for busy days when you want a homemade meal with minimal effort.

preparation.step: Brown the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat, breaking it apart as it cooks. Drain excess fat.
Transfer the cooked beef to a 6-quart crockpot.
Add the marinara sauce, beef broth, uncooked ziti, italian seasoning, salt, and black pepper to the crockpot.
Stir well to combine all ingredients.
Cover and cook on low for 4 hours, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
In the last 30 minutes of cooking, stir in the mozzarella and parmesan cheese.
Cover and let the cheese melt, about 30 minutes.
